content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5) connecting the offshore pump to the boiler

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel levels of burners and mining drills to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before starting operations.
- Regularly check the ingredient levels of stone furnaces to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to disconnection from the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network before starting operations.
- Regularly check the connections of steam engines to the electric network to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty or full before starting operations.
- Regularly check the status of pipe groups to avoid interruptions.

### Errors due to waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items before starting operations.
- Regularly check the source item levels of burner inserters to avoid interruptions.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
